message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $100.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to pay $95? I think this would still be a good deal for you.
Alice, I understand your position. I'd like to counter with $92 for the product.
